body:
with 

```
$ git log -1
commit dec6b609d8a093586eb10fe3023eac273cdd0dad
Author: Massimiliano Culpo <massimiliano.culpo@googlemail.com>
Date:   Sat Sep 2 14:51:27 2017 +0200

    Updated llvm to version 4.0.1 Fixed indentation of dict literal (#5272)
```
i get an error
```
$ spack env openmpi
==> Error: setup_package() takes exactly 2 arguments (1 given)
```

Best regards
Benjamin
title: spack env is broken (setup_package)
